content: eden cottage yarns materials gauge eden cottage yarns oakworth dk dk 22sts and 32 row to 10cm 4in over textured 100% superwash polwarth wool 220m / stitch in the round on 4mm us 6 needles 245yds per 100g skein after blocking shade hazel pattern notes one set of 4mm / us 6 double pointed needles or the size needed to obtain the correct gauge note these are worked in the round use whichever method you prefer for this one stitch marker to mark beginning of round if required tapestry needle scissors abbreviations size k knit p purl one size could be adapted by casting on pm place marker more or fewer stitches round s round s finished circumference 27 - 40cm / repeat repeat 10 5 - 15 75 in st s stitch es length 24 5cm / 9 5 in quoted sizes are taken after washing but lightly blocked up to fully stretched © eden cottage yarns / victoria magnus 2019 / page 2 pattern make two cast on 60 sts pm to indicate beg of round - if using double pointed needles this will need to sit one stitch in to stop it falling off the end of the needle rnds 1-11 *k2 p2 repeat from * around round 12 *k1 p1 repeat from * around round 13 k around repeat rnds 12-13 a total of 25 times this creates the textured stitch repeat round 13 once more repeat rnds 1-11 cast off loosely - you might want to use a larger needle size finishing wash your leg warmers and lightly block them - i would suggest that you let them spring back to their natural dimensions in order to have a stretchy and cosy finished fabric © eden cottage yarns / victoria magnus 2019 / page 3 also available from eden cottage yarns collingham gatekeeper laverton contact details yarns patterns digital printed and books and much more available on the website http //www edencottageyarns co uk digital patterns also available from ravelry http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/eden-cottage-yarns join in the chatter in the ravelry group http //www ravelry com/groups/eden-cottage view all yarns on ravelry http //www ravelry com/yarns/brands/eden-cottage-yarns find us on social media twitter @edencottage instagram @edencottageyarns facebook www facebook com/groups/theecygarden pinterest www pinterest co uk/edencottageyarn/ email info@edencottageyarns co uk copyright victoria magnus / eden cottage yarns 2019 all rights reserved please do not copy or distribute this pattern
